TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Muhammadu_Buhari, title = Muhammadu_Buhari, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muhammadu_Buhari} }

S.FORM: Muhammadu Buhari I 1942 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 17 a romi'ad masofoc ci Muhammadu Buhari, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Nigeria anini i ci Muhammadu Buhari, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 29 a romi'ad.

Mohammado Bohari I 1942 a miheca saka 12 folad saka 17 a romi'ad masofoc ci Mohammado Bohari, malamikomoday a tamdaw. O Sawara'an no kitakit no Nigeria anini i ci Mohammado Bohari, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 5 folad saka 29 a romi'ad.
